description: This record covers single maps of Alaska covering regions of Alaska, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps and photocopies of printed or manuscript single maps and may also include some multi-sheet single maps, plates from atlases, books or periodicals, and printed facsimiles. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. This collection includes a few maps in Russian.

description: This record covers single maps of Hawaii, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. This collection includes single printed maps, photocopies of single maps as well as multi-sheet single maps, and plates from atlases, books and periodicals. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. LC Trails, 5, 24, 77, 139, 140, 141 Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. Most maps in English. Two maps in French. HI-01-01 through HI-01-30.

contents: HI-01-01. New chart of the Sandwich Islands, including oWhyhee, where Captn. Cooke was killed on Sunday, the 14th of February 1779. Published 1784 -- HI-01-02. 2 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Carte des parties des Îles Sandwich, qui ont été visitées au mois de mai 1786 par les frégates françaises la Boussole et l'Astrolabe, assujettie aux observations faites à bord de ces frégates. Map 2. Carte des parties des Îles Sandwich, assujettie aux observations faites à bord de des frégates la Boussole et l'Astrolabe, pour les parties qui ont été visitées par ces frégates et aux observations du Capitaine Cook pour les autres parties de cet archipel. Published 1797 -- HI-01-03. 6 views on 1 sheet. Vues des Îles Sandwich et autres îles. Published 1798? Torn, with losses in the lower margin -- HI-01-04. Hawaiian Islands from British Admiralty chart. Published between 1856 and 1871? -- HI-01-05. Sandwich Islands. Published between 1820 and 1829? Lower left corner cut away -- HI-01-06. Map of the Hawaiian Islands. Published 1843 -- HI-01-07. 7 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Colton's Hawaiian Group or Sandwich Islands. Map 2. Samoan or Navigators Is. Map 3. New Zealand. Map 4. Viti Group or Feejee Islands--Tonga or Friendly Is. Map 5. Society Islands. Map 6. Marquesas or Washington Is. Map 7. Galapagos Islands. Hand colored. Published 1855?. From 1871 atlas -- HI-01-08. 7 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Colton's Hawaiian Group or Sandwich Islands. Map 2. Samoan or Navigators Is. Map 3. New Zealand. Map 4. Viti Group or Feejee Islands--Tonga or Friendly Is. Map 5. Society Islands. Map 6. Marquesas or Washington Is. Map 7. Galapagos Islands. Text on verso. Published 1855?. From 1861 atlas -- HI-01-09. 7 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Colton's Hawaiian Group or Sandwich Islands. Map 2. Samoan or Navigators Is. Map 3. New Zealand. Map 4. Viti Group or Feejee Islands--Tonga or Friendly Is. Map 5. Society Islands. Map 6. Marquesas or Washington Is. Map 7. Galapagos Islands. Text on verso. Published 1855?. From 1863 atlas.

HI-01-10. 7 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Colton's Hawaiian Group or Sandwich Islands. Map 2. Samoan or Navigators Is. Map 3. New Zealand. Map 4. Viti Group or Feejee Islands--Tonga or Friendly Is. Map 5. Society Islands. Map 6. Marquesas or Washington Is. Map 7. Galapagos Islands. Text on verso. Published 1855?. From 1856 atlas -- HI-01-11. 7 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Colton's Hawaiian Group or Sandwich Islands. Map 2. Samoan or Navigators Is. Map 3. New Zealand. Map 4. Viti Group or Feejee Islands--Tonga or Friendly Is. Map 5. Society Islands. Map 6. Marquesas or Washington Is. Map 7. Galapagos Islands. Text on verso. Published 1855?. From 1857 atlas. Encapusulated in rice paper -- 7 maps on 1 sheet. Map 1. Colton's Hawaiian Group or Sandwich Islands. Map 2. Samoan or Navigators Is. Map 3. New Zealand. Map 4. Viti Group or Feejee Islands--Tonga or Friendly Is. Map 5. Society Islands. Map 6. Marquesas or Washington Is. Map 7. Galapagos Islands. Text on verso. Published 1855?. From 1859 atlas. Encapusulated in rice paper -- HI-01-13. Hawaiian Archipelago. Text on verso. Published 1873. From Harper's new monthly magazine -- HI-01-14. Map of the Hawaiian Islands. Hand colored. Published 1876. Sectioned in 4 and mounted -- HI-01-15. 2 different maps with the same title. Hawaiian Govt. Survey. Blueprint. Published 1879 -- HI-01-16. Map of the Hawaiian Islands. Published 1886. Annotated, with attached note -- HI-01-17. Sandwich Islands. Text on verso. Published 1889 -- HI-01-18. Hawaiian Islands, North Pacific Ocean. Published 1897?. 3 copies. Copies 1 and 2 printed with signature "complements of John Murray Mitchell". Copy 3 lacks signature -- HI-01-19. Map of the Hawaiian Islands. Published 1892. Sectioned in 2 and mounted on cloth with losses throughout.

HI-01-20. [Hawaiian Islands]. Lacks title. Published 1894 -- HI-01-21. Hawaiian Islands, North Pacific Ocean. Hand colored. Published 1893 -- HI-01-22. 2 maps. Map 1. Maui, Lanai, Molokai and Kahoolawe. Map 2. Hawaii from the latest surveys. Published 1896 -- HI-01-23. Hawaiian Islands. Published 1897 -- HI-01-24. Hawaii. Color. Published 1898 -- HI-01-25. Hawaiian Islands. Published 1899? -- HI-01-26. Hawaii prepared especially for the Mercantile Guide and Bureau Co. Published 1899 -- HI-01-27. Map of Hawaii. Color. Published 1899. 2 copies -- HI-01-28. Image not available. Published between 1900 and 1930? -- HI-01-29. Hawaiian Islands. Color. Published 1900? -- HI-01-30. Map of Hawaii prepared especially for the National Newspaper Directory & Gazetteer. Color. Published 1900.
medium: 34 maps in folders in 1 drawer : some color, some hand colored, some photocopies ; various sizes.

This collection includes single printed maps and photocopies of single maps and may also include some multi-sheet single maps, plates from atlases, books or periodicals, and printed facsimiles. These maps also show various subjects including coasts, parks and reserves, roads, and recreation and tourism. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/.
Title supplied by cataloger.
Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image.
HI-14-01 through HI-14-22.

description: This record covers single maps of Hawaii cities and towns, which are not represented in the LC database by separate catalog records. Uncataloged maps of Honolulu are covered by a separate collection level record. This collection includes single printed maps and blueline prints and may include photocopies of printed or manuscript single maps as well as some multi-sheet single maps, plates from atlases, books or periodicals, and printed facsimiles. These maps may also show various subjects, such as land owners and recreation and tourism. To request a specific map or for more information, contact a reference librarian in the Geography & Map Division (202) 707-6277 or through the "Ask a librarian" link through the Geography & Map Division website https://www.loc.gov/rr/geogmap/. Title supplied by cataloger. Maps in this collection that may be in copyright are not available online. Available also through the Library of Congress Web site as a raster image. HI-18-01 through HI-18-25.
